Member Function Documentation

Double_t AdaptTo ( const KTEvent *  event,
Double_t  length 
) [virtual]

Sets fBinWidth to event->GetBinWidth(), and adapts the length to be the integer multiple of the bin width closest to the given length. Returns the adapted length.

Definition at line 55 of file KTEventWindowFunction.cc.

Double_t AdaptTo ( const KTEvent *  event  )  [virtual]

Sets fBinWidth to event->GetBinWidth(), and adapts the length to be the integral number of bins closest to the current fLength. Returns the adapted length. If you also need to set the length, it is recommended that you use AdaptTo(const TEvent*, Double_t) instead of separately setting the length.

virtual void RebuildWindowFunction (  )  [protected, pure virtual]

Double_t SetBinWidth ( Double_t  bw  )  [virtual]

Sets fBinWidth to bw, and adapts the length to be the integral number of bins closest to the current fLength. Returns the adapted length. It is recommended that you have already set fLength before calling this function.

Implements KTWindowFunction.

Definition at line 132 of file KTEventWindowFunction.cc.

Double_t SetBinWidthAndLength ( Double_t  bw,
Double_t  length 
)

Adapts the given length to the be an integer multiple of the given bin width (bw). Returns the adapted length.

Definition at line 142 of file KTEventWindowFunction.cc.

Double_t SetLength ( Double_t  length  )  [virtual]

Adapts the given length to be the integer multiple of fBinWidth. Returns the adapted width. If you also need to set the bin width, it is highly recommended that you use SetBinWidthAndLength(Double_t, Double_t).

Implements KTWindowFunction.

Definition at line 123 of file KTEventWindowFunction.cc.

Double_t SetSize ( Int_t  size  )  [virtual]

Sets fWidthInBins directly; leaves fBinWidth as is, and sets fWidth accordingly. Returns the adapted length.

Implements KTWindowFunction.
